nl.q42.jue

Class HueBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.q42.jue.HueBridge

  • public class HueBridge
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a connection with a Hue bridge.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HueBridge(java.lang.String ip)
      Connect with a bridge as a new user.
      HueBridge(java.lang.String ip, java.lang.String username)
      Connect with a bridge as an existing user.

      • getConfig

        public Config getConfig()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        ApiException
        Returns basic configuration of the bridge (name and firmware version) and more detailed info if there is an authenticated user.
        Returns:
        Config or AuthenticatedConfig if authenticated
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ApiException
        See Also:
        Config

      • link

        public void link(java.lang.String username,
        java.lang.String devicetype)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 ApiException
        Link with bridge using the specified username and device type.
        Parameters:
        username - username for new user [10..40]
        devicetype - identifier of application [0..40]
        Throws:
        ApiException - throws LinkButtonException if the bridge button has not been pressed, ApiException for other errors
        java.io.IOException

      • link

        public java.lang.String link(java.lang.String devicetype)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             ApiException
        Link with bridge using the specified device type. A random valid username will be generated by the bridge and returned.
        Parameters:
        devicetype - identifier of application [0..40]
        Returns:
        new random username generated by bridge
        Throws:
        ApiException - throws LinkButtonException if the bridge button has not been pressed, ApiException for other errors
        java.io.IOException

      • unlink

        public void unlink()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   ApiException
        Unlink the current user from the bridge.
        Throws:
        ApiException - throws UnauthorizedException if the user no longer exists, ApiException for other errors
        java.io.IOException

      • startSearch

        public void startSearch()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        ApiException
        Start searching for new lights for 1 minute. A maximum amount of 15 new lights will be added.
        Throws:
        ApiException - throws UnauthorizedException if the user no longer exists, ApiException for other errors
        java.io.IOException

      • setLightName

        public java.lang.String setLightName(Light light,
                            java.lang.String name)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     ApiException
        Changes the name of the light and returns the new name. NOTE: A number will be appended to duplicate names, which may result in a new name exceeding 32 characters.
        Parameters:
        light - light
        name - new name [0..32]
        Returns:
        new name
        Throws:
        ApiException - throws UnauthorizedException if the user no longer exists, ApiException for other errors
        java.io.IOException
